corporate.title: Corporate & Business Law
corporate.shortDescription: Comprehensive legal advice for companies at all stages of development.
corporate.description: We offer comprehensive legal advice for individuals and companies at all stages of development, from formation to merger, acquisition, or liquidation processes. We optimize corporate structure to ensure asset protection and tax efficiency.

nuevasTecnologias.title: New Technologies
nuevasTecnologias.shortDescription: Specialized advice on digital law, blockchain and asset tokenization.
nuevasTecnologias.description: We help innovative companies navigate the complex regulatory framework of new technologies. Our advice covers blockchain, asset tokenization, smart contracts, FinTech, and emerging technologies within the current legal framework.

features.title: Technology law services
features.f1: Legal framework for blockchain and crypto assets

startupsInnovacion.title: Startups and Innovation
startupsInnovacion.shortDescription: Legal guidance for entrepreneurs and startups at all stages.
startupsInnovacion.description: We accompany entrepreneurs from the idea to funding rounds. Our advisory services include corporate structuring, shareholder agreements, intellectual property, know-how protection, and investor negotiations.

fiscal.title: Tax Residency and Investment
fiscal.shortDescription: Specialized advice on international tax residency and strategic investments.
fiscal.description: We are specialists in international tax residency and investment processes. We offer comprehensive advice on tax optimization, foreign investment, relocation, and regulatory compliance across different jurisdictions.

proteccionDatos.title: Data Protection
proteccionDatos.shortDescription: Implementation of compliance measures in data protection and privacy.
proteccionDatos.description: We implement data protection compliance measures tailored to your business. We conduct audits, develop privacy policies, data processing agreements, and advise on possible security breaches.

features.title: Data protection services
features.f1: Adaptation to GDPR and local regulations

fiscalidad.title: Taxation
fiscalidad.shortDescription: Legal tax optimization for individuals and legal entities at national and international levels.
fiscalidad.description: We optimize taxation for individuals and legal entities within the current legal framework. We advise on national and international taxation, transfer pricing, asset planning, and representation in tax inspections.

realestate.title: Real Estate
realestate.shortDescription: Legal advice on real estate transactions and urban planning.
realestate.description: We provide comprehensive legal advice at all stages of real estate operations, from property acquisition to sale. We manage urban planning procedures, lease agreements, real estate due diligence, and advise on development and construction projects.

features.title: Real estate services
features.f1: Purchase and sale of residential and commercial properties

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I request an initial consultation?
faq.a1: You can request an initial consultation through our contact form, by phone or by email. We will respond within 24 hours to schedule a first meeting with no obligation.
faq.q2: Do you work with international clients?
faq.a2: Yes, we work with clients from around the world. Our team is multilingual and we have extensive experience in international legal consulting, especially in Europe and Latin America.
faq.a3: Our fees vary according to the type of service and the complexity of the case. We offer both monthly retainers and project-based fees. We will provide you with a detailed quote with no obligation after analyzing your specific needs.

contactSection.title: Need legal advice?
contactSection.description: Our team of specialist lawyers is ready to help you with any legal inquiry related to your company or project.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Some words from
testimonials.description: Discover what our clients say about our dedication and excellence in legal service.

1.name: Marc Taló
1.text: An excellent and very professional service. We are very happy with their attention and results.

2.name: Fernando Mas
2.text: Without a doubt, a team of highly professional and attentive lawyers, with a very high level of resolution and willing to help and advise you on any legal question at all times. I have been counting on their help for years and always with a high level of satisfaction.

3.name: Rafael Rabat
3.text: We have been working with the Emindset Law team for some time and I vouch for their quality and professionalism.

4.name: Sergi Martin
4.text: Emindset combines trust and rigor in equal parts. With high professionalism, their team offers precise and effective legal solutions, always with empathetic and approachable treatment that leads to personalized attention. And all this with a fresh approach to work, with a modern and proactive vision of law.

mission.title: Our philosophy
mission.subtitle: Mission and Values
mission.description: Our commitment is to solve your legal challenges with a modern and efficient approach.
mission.quote: Our mission is to help and serve others
mission.statement1: When something important is at stake, you are not at peace. You know a false step can be costly.
mission.statement2: At Emindset Law we understand you. We know how it feels. That's why we arrive with solutions before the problem appears. Because the worst conflict is the one that could have been avoided.
mission.statement3: And a good agreement is worth more than a thousand battles. Because you are not here to lose any.
mission.statement4: We don't put out fires, we prevent them. Preventing, helping, and protecting: that is our real job. We take care of you as if your business were our own. Because this is not about laws. It's about you. And about protecting what has cost you so much to build.

cta_section.title: Need advice?
cta_section.subtitle: Request a no-obligation quote
cta_section.description: Our team will contact you within 24 hours to analyze your case.

items.description: Recognition for leadership in business advisory and the ability to adapt in times of change and economic uncertainty.

items.title: Top Legal Strategist to Look Out For in 2025

items.title: Corporate Law Expert of the Year in Andorra 2024-2025

items.title: Corporate and Real Estate Law Advisers of the Year in Andorra
items.description: Recognition awarded by Global Business Magazine for our outstanding work in corporate and real estate legal advisory services in Andorra.

blog.title: Our Blog
blog.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news and publications from our team
blog.instagramNote: The posts shown are representative. Visit our Instagram to see all publications.
blog.connectDescription: Follow us on LinkedIn to stay updated with all our publications, events, and legal sector news.

history.title: Our History
history.subtitle: Discover how Emindset Law was born and evolved over the years

story.paragraph1: A law firm that was born in 2016, thanks to a team with a common vision:
story.highlight1: to humanize the legal profession and break with all stereotypes.
story.paragraph2: It could be a useful, approachable, and deeply human tool.
story.paragraph3: A real way to accompany and transform lives.
story.paragraph4: From the very beginning, we have always remained true to our mission, which is to help and serve our clients wherever their needs are.
story.paragraph5: From the beginning, we knew we wanted to do things differently.
story.paragraph6: Not from the coldness of the suit and the office, but from listening and commitment to people.
story.paragraph7: And, to be honest, arriving with a new mindset wasn't easy.
story.paragraph8: Breaking with the established always commands respect.
story.paragraph9: But over time, it was that human and authentic perspective
story.paragraph10: that allowed us to make a difference and become a reference in the legal sector.
story.highlight2: Always faithful to what drives us:
story.paragraph11: helping and being present when we are needed most.
story.quote: "Transforming law into a human and approachable experience since 2016."

timeline.title: Important milestones
timeline.subtitle: OUR JOURNEY
timeline.description: A glimpse of the key moments that have defined our trajectory.

items.2016: Foundation of Emindset Law with a small team of 5 lawyers committed to a different vision of law.
items.2018: Opening of our first office in Barcelona and expansion of the team to 15 professionals.
items.2020: International expansion with the opening of our global network of offices, specializing internationally in commercial law, taxation, and new technologies.
items.2022: Creation of our New Technologies division, focused on startups and technology companies.
items.2024: Opening of our office in Toulouse and recognition as one of the most innovative law firms in Europe. We receive the 'Corporate Law Expert of the Year in Andorra 2024-2025' award and the 'CEO of the Year in the Legal Sector in Spain' award, by Foment del Treball and La Razón newspaper.
items.2025: International recognitions confirm our path of excellence: 'Recognized as Best Commercial Law Firm in Spain' and 'Corporate Law Experts of the Year' in Andorra.

legal.title: Legal Notice
legal.section1_p1: These provisions regulate the use of the service of www.emindsetlaw.com (hereinafter, the "Website"), which EMINDSET LAW FIRM, S.L. (hereinafter, "Emindset Law" or the "Firm") makes available to Internet users.
legal.section1_p2: Emindset Law, with registered office in Andorra la Vella, C/ Prat de la Creu 59-65, Ed. Prat de la Creu, Staircase A, Floor 4, Office 1A (AD500) ANDORRA and N.R.T. L711141C, is registered in the Andorra Company Registry with number 16035 and Commerce Registry with number 927360-J. Phone: +376728882. Email: contact@emindsetlaw.com
legal.section1_p3: Access to the Website is free except for the cost of the connection through the telecommunications network supplied by the access provider contracted by users. Certain services are exclusive to our clients and their access is restricted. The legal or tax services provided by the Firm have the price indicated in the corresponding professional services proposal and in no case are offered or provided through the Website service.
legal.section1_p4: The use of the Website attributes the status of user of the Website (hereinafter, the "User") and implies acceptance of all the conditions included in this legal notice which regulate the conditions of use (hereinafter, the "Conditions of Use"). The provision of the Website service has a duration limited to the moment in which the User is connected to the Website or to any of the services that are provided through it. Therefore, the User must carefully read this Legal Notice on each of the occasions when they intend to use the Website, as it and its Conditions of Use may undergo modifications.
legal.section1_p5: Some services of the Website accessible to Internet users or exclusive to Emindset Law clients may be subject to particular conditions, regulations, and instructions which, where applicable, replace, complete and/or modify this Legal Notice and must be accepted by the User before the provision of the corresponding services begins.
legal.section2_p1: The Website contains material prepared by Emindset Law for informational purposes only. The user should note that such material may not reflect the most recent legislative or jurisprudential state on the issues analyzed. Likewise, Emindset Law reserves the right to modify, expand, or reduce the material offered through the Website at any time, informing the Users.
legal.section2_p2: The material contained in the Website cannot serve, in any case, as a substitute for legal advice or advice of another nature. Access to this material is not intended to constitute or imply any relationship between lawyer and client, or any other type of relationship of trust or professional relationship between Emindset Law and the User of the Website. Therefore, the User should not act on the basis of the information contained therein, without previously resorting to the corresponding professional advice. Likewise, the User should not send Emindset Law any type of confidential information without having previously consulted with one of our lawyers and having received authorization to submit said information.
legal.section3_p1: In general, the User undertakes to comply with these Conditions of Use, as well as to comply with the special warnings or instructions for use contained therein and always to act in accordance with the Law in force, morals, good customs and the requirements of good faith and public order established, using due diligence, and refraining from using the Website in any way that may prevent, damage or deteriorate its normal operation, the assets or rights of Emindset Law, the rest of Users or, in general, any third party.
legal.section3_p2: Specifically, and without implying any restriction on the previous section, the User undertakes to:
legal.section3_li1: Provide truthful information about the data requested in the forms provided by Emindset Law for access to certain contents or services offered through the Website. Emindset Law reserves the right, without prejudice to other legal measures at its disposal, to withdraw, deny or suspend access to the Website in the event that the data provided is or may be false, inaccurate or misleading. In any case, the User will be fully responsible for any data or content that they transmit or communicate to Emindset Law. In this sense, the User assumes responsibility for any damages that may arise from improper use of the same.
legal.section3_li2: Not introduce, store, download, modify, decompile, license, lease, sell or imitate the Website, its contents or its design.
legal.section4_p1: Emindset Law is not responsible for damages that could result from interference, omissions, interruptions, computer viruses, breakdowns and/or disconnections in the operational functioning of the electronic system or in the computers and equipment of the Users, for causes beyond Emindset Law, which prevent or delay navigation through the Website.
legal.section4_p2: However, Emindset Law declares that it has adopted and will adopt, where appropriate, all necessary measures within its possibilities and the state of technology, to guarantee the correct functioning of the Website and avoid the existence and transmission of viruses and other harmful components to Users.
legal.section4_p3: Emindset Law reserves the right to interrupt access to the Website at any time and without prior notice, whether for technical, security, control, maintenance reasons, supply failures or any other cause.
legal.section5_p1: All Intellectual and Industrial Property rights, as well as all the information contained in the Website (including its information, texts, data, images, graphics, designs, brands, navigation structures, databases, etc., and any other content that appears in it) are the exclusive property of Emindset Law or third parties, without any of the exploitation rights recognized by current regulations on intellectual property being understood to be assigned to the User, except those that are strictly necessary for the use of the Website.
legal.section5_p2: The trademarks, trade names or distinctive signs are owned by Emindset Law or third parties, without it being understood that access to the Website attributes any right over said trademarks, trade names and/or distinctive signs.
legal.section5_p3: The User is only authorized to view the contents for their exclusive personal and private use, but Emindset Law does not authorize them to be subsequently assigned to third parties.
legal.section6_p1: Emindset Law will protect Users' personal data and use it only to the extent permitted by law or whenever Users have given their consent. For more information on the processing of your personal data on the Website, please refer to the Privacy Policy.
legal.section6_p2:
DATA COLLECTION FORMS

Without prejudice to the provisions of the Privacy Policy, the use of certain services or requests addressed to Emindset Law are subject to the prior completion of the corresponding User registration form.

All information provided by the user through the forms on the Website for the above or any other purposes must be truthful. For these purposes, the user guarantees the authenticity of all the data they communicate and will keep the information provided to Emindset Law perfectly updated so that it responds, at all times, to the real situation of the User. In any case, the user will be solely responsible for false or inaccurate statements they make and for the damage caused to Emindset Law or third parties due to the information they provide.
legal.section7_p1: These Conditions of Use refer only to the Website and do not apply to links, third-party web pages accessible through it or, in general, any other service provided by third parties.
legal.section7_p2: Consequently, Emindset Law does not assume any type of responsibility that may derive from them.
legal.section7_p3: Emindset Law offers the User such links and information and/or services solely for the convenience of the User, it being the responsibility of the User to read and accept the terms of use and privacy policies published on said websites. Their inclusion in the Website does not imply approval of the linked website by Emindset Law.
legal.section8_p1: Emindset Law reserves the right to make changes without prior notice that it deems appropriate to its Website, being able to change, delete or add both the contents and services provided through it and the way in which they are presented or located.
legal.section9_p1: For the purposes of these Conditions of Use, and for any necessary communication between Emindset Law and the User, the latter must contact Emindset Law by email (send a message to contact@emindsetlaw.com) or by written communication addressed to Emindset Law, C/ Prat de la Creu 59-65, Ed. Prat de la Creu, Staircase A, Floor 4, Office 1A (AD500) Andorra la Vella, Principat d'Andorra. Communications from Emindset Law to the User will be made according to the data provided by the User when registering on the Website. The User expressly accepts for all communications related to the use of the Website, the use of email as a valid procedure for sending such communications.
legal.section10_p1: In the event of any incident in the functionality or operability of the Site, the User may communicate it via email to the contact address in the previous section.
legal.section10_p2: These Terms of Use are governed entirely by Andorran tax and commercial legislation. For the resolution of any conflict that may arise from access to the Website, the User and Emindset Law expressly submit to the jurisdiction of the Andorran courts, waiving their own jurisdiction if they have one.
legal.section10_p3: In the event that any clause of this Legal Notice is declared null and void, the remaining clauses will remain in force and will be interpreted taking into account the will of the parties and the purpose of these conditions.
